name: IMOV
description: IMOV is an inclusive fitness app for people of all abilities that lets you earn cryptocurrency while you walk and get healthy, we aim to nudge millions toward a healthier lifestyle and connect them to Web 3.0. IMOV Metaverse Mission: Motivating the world user community to exercise more and earn more passive income based on health data, That gives a reason for the users to walk more often and use less vehicles which will reduce the carbon foot print.
